spec_data.Name: rubygem-progressbar
spec_data.Description:
ProgressBar is a text progress bar library for Ruby. It can indicate
progress with percentage, a progress bar, and estimated remaining time.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:16:36 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ruby text progress bar generator library
